attributes.action: Remove the age restrictions on Working Tax Credit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I, as well as most of the people I work with, do not qualify for Working Tax Credit as I am under the age of 25. I still have the same costs as somebody aged 25 but am not entitled to the same Tax Credits as them.

Had Labour not removed the 10p tax rate, this is the rate I would have been taxed under. Instead, they have introduced Tax Credits which leave many people ineligible for help.

As a young person, I am employed full time and am fully independent. I receive nothing in return for hard work and being everything the government expects me to be.
